title: Campagnolo Super Record S Wireless
content:
Campagnolo just announced its all-new Super Record S Wireless groupset, which offers a more competitive price point compared to Super Record Wireless, a wider gear range, and a solid carbon crankset with only a 150-gram penalty. Let’s check out the Super Record S Wireless group in detail below…

Campagnolo Super Record S Wireless Quick Hits

  • All-new 52×36, 53×39, and 54×39 cranksets
  • As well as previous 45×29, 48×32, and 50×34 cranksets
  • Cassette sizing: 10/27, 10/29, and a new 11/32
  • Super Record S Wireless MSRP: $ 4299 compared to $5399 for Super Record Wireless MSRP

Super Record S sports a non-hollow full carbon crankset capable of providing the same performance as the Super Record Wireless with an increased weight of just 150 grams.

This new kit comes in a matte black finish, accentuating its aerodynamic lines but this release isn’t strictly about the looks. The Campagnolo S version offers a new, wider range of gear ratios offered at a competitive price for those wanting a Campagnolo wireless groupset without spending the extra-premium of Super Record Wireless.

The new Super Record S Wireless has been designed to meet the needs of cyclists of all levels. Specifically, cranksets are offered in six configurations: in addition to the previous 45×29, 48×32, and 50×34 – confirmed in this range – the “S” version adds the new 52×36, 53×39, and 54×39 cranksets. There are three combination choices for the cassettes: 10/27, 10/29, and the new 11/32 cassette.

Super Record S Wireless sports wider gear ratios than the Super Record Wireless, but the same precise and reliable technology, the Super Record S Wireless group features:

  • Ultra-Torque™ system for maximum power transmission efficiency
  • Pro-Tech™ patented external dustproof protective seal
  • Superior braking performance thanks to the tested Campagnolo braking system
  • Perfect ergonomics of controls and total adaptability of the lever
  • LED interface for highly visible battery status
  • All-round cycling experience via the MyCampy 3.0 app, to check riding performance
    or view the battery status at any time and place.

Pricing:

Super Record S Wireless groupset MSRP: $ 4299 or € 3.990
The Bora Ultra WTO Matt Edition wheels MSRP: $ 4149 or € 3.800
The Bora WTO Matt Edition wheels MSRP: $ 2949 or € 2.700

See more at Campagnolo.
